item.text: The Lord’s message came to Jeremiah while King Nebuchadnezzar of Babylon was attacking Jerusalem and the towns around it with a large army. This army consisted of troops from his own army and from the kingdoms and peoples of the lands under his dominion.

This is what the Lord God of Israel told Jeremiah, “Go, speak to King Zedekiah of Judah. Tell him, ‘This is what the Lord has said: “Take note! I am going to hand this city over to the king of Babylon, and he will burn it down.

<st data-num="0859" class="">You yourself</st> will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04422" class="">escape</st> his <st data-num="03027">clutches</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">but</st> will <st data-num="08610" class="">certainly</st> be <st data-num="08610" class="">captured</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">handed over</st> to <st data-num="03027" class="">him</st>. You must <st data-num="07200" class="">confront</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">face</st> <st data-num="0854">to</st> <st data-num="05869" class="">face</st> and <st data-num="01696" class="">answer</st> to <st data-num="06310" class="">him</st> <st data-num="06310" class="">personally</st>.<n id="1" /> Then you must <st data-num="0935" class="">go</st> to <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>.”’
However, listen to the Lord’s message, King Zedekiah of Judah. This is what the Lord has said: ‘You will not die in battle or be executed.

You will die a peaceful death. They will burn incense at your burial just as they did at the burial of your ancestors, the former kings who preceded you. They will mourn for you, saying, “Alas, master!” Indeed, you have my own word on this. I, the Lord, affirm it!’”
The prophet Jeremiah told all these things to King Zedekiah of Judah in Jerusalem.

He did this while the army of the king of Babylon was attacking Jerusalem and the cities of Lachish and Azekah. He was attacking these cities because they were the only fortified cities of Judah that were still holding out.
The Lord spoke to Jeremiah after King Zedekiah had made a covenant with all the people in Jerusalem to grant their slaves their freedom.

The Lord’s message came to Jeremiah,
“The Lord God of Israel has a message for you: ‘I made a covenant with your ancestors when I brought them out of Egypt where they had been slaves. It stipulated,

But then you <st data-num="07725" class="">turned</st> right <st data-num="07725" class="">around</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02490" class="">showed that</st> you <st data-num="02490" class="">did not honor</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">me</st>.<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0376" class="">Each</st> of you <st data-num="07725" class="">took back</st> your <st data-num="05650" class="">male</st> and <st data-num="08198" class="">female</st> <st data-num="05650 08198">slaves</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> you had <st data-num="07971 02670">freed</st> as they <st data-num="05315" class="">desired</st>, and you <st data-num="03533" class="">forced</st> them to <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> your <st data-num="05650 08198">slaves</st> again.<n id="3" />

So I, the Lord, say: “You have not really obeyed me and granted freedom to your neighbor and fellow countryman. Therefore, I will grant you freedom, the freedom to die in war, or by starvation, or disease. I, the Lord, affirm it! I will make all the kingdoms of the earth horrified at what happens to you.

I will punish those <st data-num="0376" class="">people</st> who have <st data-num="05674" class="">violated</st> their <st data-num="01285" class="">covenant</st> with me. I will <st data-num="05414" class="">make</st> them like the <st data-num="05695 0834">calf</st> they <st data-num="03772" class="">cut</st> in <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> and <st data-num="05674" class="">passed</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> its <st data-num="01335" class="">pieces</st>.<n id="1" /> I will do so <st data-num="0834" class="">because</st> they did <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06965" class="">keep</st> the <st data-num="01697" class="">terms</st> of the <st data-num="01285 0834">covenant</st> they <st data-num="03772" class="">made</st> in my <st data-num="06440" class="">presence</st>.<n id="2" />

I will punish the <st data-num="08269" class="">leaders</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and <st data-num="03389" class="">Jerusalem</st>, the <st data-num="05631" class="">court officials</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the other <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> who <st data-num="05674" class="">passed</st> <st data-num="0996" class="">between</st> the <st data-num="01335" class="">pieces</st> of the <st data-num="05695" class="">calf</st>.<n id="2" />

Their <st data-num="05038" class="">dead bodies</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> <st data-num="03978" class="">food</st> for the <st data-num="05775 08064">birds</st> and the <st data-num="0776" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="0929" class="">animals</st>.<n id="1" />

I will also <st data-num="05414" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="06667" class="">Zedekiah</st> of <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and his <st data-num="08269" class="">officials</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> their <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st> who <st data-num="01245" class="">want</st> to <st data-num="05315" class="">kill</st> them. I will hand them <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> the <st data-num="02428" class="">army</st> of the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0894" class="">Babylon</st>, even though they have temporarily <st data-num="05927" class="">withdrawn</st> from <st data-num="05921" class="">attacking</st> you.<n id="1" />

For I, the Lord, affirm that I will soon give the order and bring them back to this city. They will fight against it and capture it and burn it down. I will also make the towns of Judah desolate so that there will be no one living in them.”’”
